contact.title: Let's talk?
contact.text: I'm open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you'd like to discuss a project or just chat about technology, send me a message.

footer.easterEggHint: Hint: Type "math" to reveal mathematical easter eggs and look for the Rubik's cube!

seo.title: Gustavo Cunha Lacerda | Portfolio
seo.description: Portfolio of Gustavo Cunha Lacerda - Full Stack Developer

resume.error: Error generating CV. Please try again.

data.summary: I'm a full stack developer with experience building large-scale web and mobile applications â€” from clinical platforms used by thousands of doctors to internal systems for government agencies. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple solutions, with clean code and a focus on the end user. I also have a background in machine learning research, with a publication at an international conference.

dataprev.title: Systems Analyst
dataprev.description:
- Solo development of the Technical Management Platform, an internal system that standardizes and automates contract oversight processes (issuance of RGTs, memos, TRs, and TAs), used by ~3,500 DATAPREV employees.
- Complete migration of a legacy MVC system in PHP to a modern architecture with a Nuxt.js frontend and RESTful API backend (Slim Framework), adding data validation, reactivity, optimized navigation, auto-fill features, and email notifications.
- Creation of a cost and consumption dashboard for the Brazilian sovereign cloud, with indicators and management reports for procurement control.
- Implementation of unit and integration tests, increasing the reliability of a system that was previously just a direct database view.
- Management of 4 interns in support activities, access management, and data normalization.

medware.title: Full Stack Developer
medware.description:
- Full stack development on a clinical management platform used by over 6,800 clinics and 20,000 doctors across Brazil, with .NET 5 and Nuxt.
- Creation of React Native apps for clinic TVs (patient call panel) and digital signage for advertising and institutional information.
- Complete delivery (frontend and backend) of the Calculadoras Medware project, a medical calculation tool (coronary risk, BMI, among others).
- Implementation of unit tests on the reporting and dashboard backend, achieving 100% coverage and drastically reducing production bugs.

xpbox.title: Front-end Developer
xpbox.description:
- Frontend development on the MoneySuite SaaS platform (financial management), converting prototypes into Vue.js + Tailwind CSS interfaces with a focus on performance and usability.
- Work on the TraderChamps project, a trading competition platform, implementing real-time charts with WebSocket.
- Direct collaboration with the design team and backend developers, translating Figma prototypes into responsive and accessible code.
- Focus on performance optimization and scalability of delivered interfaces.

tcu.title: Mobile Application Developer
tcu.description:
- Development of a React Native mobile app for building maintenance control and validation, used by technical audit staff at TCU.
- Led the complete cycle: Figma prototyping, development, integration with REST APIs, Firebase, and Axios, through to publishing on the stores (Play Store and App Store).
- Translation of the existing web application to mobile, adapting layouts and leveraging native components for a better user experience.
- Iterative development based on direct user feedback, evolving features and providing ongoing support.

ifb.title: Academic Research
ifb.description:
- Development of a Deep Fake detection model with Python, MediaPipe, and PyTorch, achieving 93% accuracy on a dataset of ~5,600 videos (~100 frames extracted per video).
- Undergraduate research (PIBIC) with a CNPq scholarship, resulting in a publication at the 35th SIBGRAPI titled "A Machine Learning Approach for Deep Fake Detection".
- Poster presentation at ConectaIF 2022, IFB's scientific production week.
- Source code and paper publicly available on GitHub and LinkedIn.

calculadoras-medware.description: Medical calculation tool (coronary risk, BMI, among others) built from scratch, frontend and backend. Used by healthcare professionals in over 6,800 clinics.

moneysuite.description: Personal finance management SaaS platform. Frontend development focused on interactive dashboards, charts, and user experience.

simp-tcu.description: Mobile app for building maintenance control and validation at the Federal Court of Accounts (TCU). Published on the Play Store and App Store.

deep-fake-detection.description: Machine learning model for Deep Fake detection with 93% accuracy, trained on ~5,600 videos. Published at the 35th SIBGRAPI.
